Me: *gestures wildly at our election system* WHO LIKES THIS?

A lot of examining a system is asking “Who likes this?” when a system is broken, the first step is to look for who benefits. Sometimes though, delightfully, you will ask “Who likes this?” for a while and it turns out no one does and then you can tear it down and make it anew.

Thats my goal as well. Trying to use both Twitter and Instagram as primarily outputs rather than outputs. Deleting the Twitter app and tweeting through SMS has been nice too, since I still get texted replies from people I follow. A pleasant twitter experience. https://t.co/OELoTSJqln
